titleStmt.title: Where as it is ordeyned and prouyded by statute that the prices of [...] and frenche wynes shulde be lymytted ...
Proclamations. 1541-12-07
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)

publicationStmt.publisher: Tho. Berthelet regius impressor excudebat. Cum priuilegio,

notesStmt.note: Bound so that text along right margin is obscured.
